acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using AI Magellan, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: Service Description
description.content: AI Magellan provides AI tools discovery and navigation services. We curate and present information about various AI tools and applications for educational and informational purposes.

user_accounts.title: User Accounts
user_accounts.registration: To access certain features of our service, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.
user_accounts.accuracy: You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and to update such information as necessary.
user_accounts.responsibility: You are solely responsible for all activities that occur under your account.

user_content.title: User Content
user_content.submission: Users may submit AI tools and websites for review. By submitting content, you grant us the right to review, edit, and display your submissions.
user_content.responsibility: You are responsible for ensuring your submissions are accurate, legal, and comply with our guidelines.
user_content.ownership: You retain ownership of any intellectual property rights in content you submit, but grant us a license to use it in connection with our services.

prohibited_conduct.title: Prohibited Conduct
prohibited_conduct.illegal_use: You may not use our service for any illegal purposes or to transmit any unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, or otherwise objectionable content.
prohibited_conduct.interference: You may not attempt to interfere with the proper functioning of our service or bypass any security measures.
prohibited_conduct.spam: You may not use our service to send spam, bulk emails, or other unsolicited communications.

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.ownership: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of AI Magellan and its licensors.
intellectual_property.license: Our service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws.
intellectual_property.respect: You agree to respect all intellectual property rights and not to copy, modify, or distribute our content without permission.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.as_is: Our service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis without any warranties of any kind.
disclaimers.accuracy: We make no representations or warranties about the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the information provided through our service.
disclaimers.third_party: We are not responsible for the content, privacy practices, or functionality of third-party websites and services featured on our platform.

limitation_liability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation_liability.content: AI Magellan shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of our services or any AI tools featured on our platform.

termination.title: Termination
termination.right: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to our services at our sole discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms of Service.
termination.effect: Upon termination, your right to use our service will cease immediately.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.modification: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new terms on our website.
changes.continued_use: Your continued use of our service after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
